charges.charge_description: Did knowingly and intentionally possess with intent to distribute approx. 1,395 kilos marijuana. 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(A). Date of Offense: July 11, 1999. Penalty: Not less than 10 years nor more than life imprisonment without probation, parole or suspended sentence, a fine of up to $4 million, at least 5 years SRT, a $100 special assessment and community restitution up to the amount of any fine imposed by the court. 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(A). Date of Offense: July 11, 1999. Penalty: Not less than 10 years nor more than life imprisonment without probation, parole or suspended sentence, a fine of up to $4 million, at least 4 years SRT, a $100 special assessment and community restitution up to the amount of any fine imposed by the ocurt. (1)

Knowingly, intentionally, and unlawfully possess w/intent to distribute a controlled substance in Schedule I of the Controlled Substances Act of 1970, to wit: 3,261 lbs (approx. gross weight) of marijuana. 21:841(a)(1) [2:99-m-253]
